728758f-a.text:
740 Clove Road, south of the S. 4. corner of Martling Avenue, showing the grounds of the Actors' Home. The view is toward one of the lakes in Clove Lakes Park. The two views were taken the same day.
About 1910
Views 1,2
By Mulford Simonson
Fromm P. L. Sperr Collection

740 Clove Road, south of the S.W. corner of Martling Ave., showing a rear view of the Actors Home, as seen from near the east
shore of gichmond Lake.

Park.

1924.
P. L. Sperr..

728755f-b.text:
(1)
740 Clove Road, south of the S.W. corner of Martling Ave., whwwing the Actors' Home. It was formerly (1898-1887) the residence of Colonel R. Penn Smith, and earlier (1874) the J.Dg Gates residence. The dates refer to maps, on which the owners'
Mnames appear.
(2)
Another view of the house as seen from the opposite direction.
(3)
A rear view of the Home as seen across Richmond Lake.
